page.title: 17SPECIAL HEALTH CENTRES BALBY
page.content: St. Catherine's Hospital, Tickhill Rd., caters for the mentally handicapped. The patients are housed in comfortable, self-contained blocks. The grounds are superb covering 6 acres, full of trees and diferently shaped lawns and flower beds. It was once privately owned but now belongs to Doncaster Health Authortiy. The big old Victorian limestone house is now the administration block. Tickhill Rd. Hospital is for geriatric patients. The wards are light, airy and warm. They are pleasantly decorated and well equipped with wheelchairs, walking aids and televisions. The patients have 24 hour supervision with beautiful grounds to wander through.
